front.title: Mobile Multicast Control Protocol in Wireless/Mobile Networks

abstract.t: This document is a part of the ITU-T Recommendation and ISO/IECInternational Standard, named the Mobile Multicast CommunicationsProtocol (MMCP). The MMCP is a protocol that can be used to support avariety of multimedia multicasting services in the IP-based wirelessmobile networks. The MMCP is targeted at the real-time one-to-manymulticast services and applications over mobile communicationsnetworks.
